author: Kowlin
description: (discontinued - Red 3.5 has native support for slash commands!) A quick and dirty solution for adding in a slash command parser, so everyone doesn't have to fight over injecting an parser.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores no personal data.
short: (discontinued - Red 3.5 has native support for slash commands!) A quick and dirty solution for adding in a slash command parser, so everyone doesn't have to fight over injecting an parser.
install_msg: Hey there! This cog is no longer needed with Red 3.5.
